author: quinlan
msg: not sure about IADB... but IADB is clearly better for us than IADB2

author: rich
msg: Changes to allow preservation of the component tree in a JSF page, so the page can be returned to (intact) using a @Jpf.Forward with navigateTo=Jpf.NavigateTo.currentPage or navigateTo=Jpf.NavigateTo.previousPage.
Also, fixed the JSF DRT app to run again (mostly build changes).

author: minfrin
msg: Use the ldapssl_init(host,port,0) function on Novell to init LDAP connections.
This removes the need to apply a workaround to support client certificates
